items.name: Heinrich Debit Card
items.description: A solid steel alloy card with an embedded chip used to track debit account balance for the Heinrich Bank of Earth.

items.name: United Americas: A Complete History
items.description: A brief yet complete history of United America written by Strompf Lucas in 2300.

items.name: XB Compact Cannon
items.desc: A small cannon which fires a projectile designed to penetrate armor.

items.name: Small armor plate
items.desc: A rather small, generic armor plate designed to mitigate damage from most projectiles.
